Articles.Content: My name is Erik, and I live in Oak Harbor, Washington. I was wondering if there is anyone in my area that is plays Kerbal. Please let me know. I need some questions answered. Thank you

I'm not exactly nearby  but you'll find that folk on these forums really like answering Qs from new players.  Head  over to gameplay-questions-and-tutorials or one of the support sections (unmodded | modded) and you'll almost certainly find the answers you seek.   Also, welcome to the forums!!
